text.__SUMMARY__: Rhododendron prinophyllum, the early azalea, is a rhododendron species native to the eastern and southern United States. It is a deciduous shrub that grows 4 to 8 feet in height. Flowers are pink.
text.References:
"Rhododendron prinophyllum", Rhododendrons 229 229 1917.
